snippet: Mark Berndt, 61, who taught for 30 years, is accused of photographing children after taping their mouths shut and putting bugs on their faces.
abstract: Mark Berndt, former South Los Angeles elementary school teacher who taught for 30 years, is arrested on charges of inflicting bizarre abuse rituals on at least 23 young girls and boys; photographs are discovered of children with their eyes and mouths taped shut, and some with cockroaches on their faces.

byline.original: By IAN LOVETT and ADAM NAGOURNEY

lead_paragraph: Mark Berndt, 61, who taught for 30 years, is accused of photographing children after taping their mouths shut and putting bugs on their faces.
